title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in boiling water until al dente.
Whisk together eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper.
Toss the spaghetti with the egg mixture and bacon.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in spices and yogurt overnight.
Prepare the sauce with tomato puree, cream, and spices.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
